body: We all may be young now, but we all have hopes and dreams for the future, right? Sadly, Minecraft can't be play for eternity (unless you try really hard). So, What do you want to be when you're older? A Scientist? An Engineer? An Artist? A Flat Slicorn? This post is just here so you can all express what you might want to be when you move on for school. Not sure if any posts like this exist right now, but all conversations aside, What do you want to be?

replies.body:
If Conservatives gets picked again, I'm going to go ballistic, because I don't want David Cameron as Prime Minister. I want someone different, but I'm not sure about Ed Milliband though. I mainly care about the hospitals, because when I injure myself, I have to wait over 5 hours just to get seen.

I've been living in London all my life, and I've never seen something so unstable like this.

I'm hoping Nigel Farage wins, he will fix this country and flippin' get rid of the unwanted people. No racism intended.
